Articles.Content:
Do you like weaponizing your ships?

Do you like making war fleets?

Do you really want to show them off?

Then you have come to the right place!

This is were you can show off your flag ships, battle ships, transport ships, and anything else you can think of!

I think it would be awesome to see all the cool ships people make, and other peoples opinion on them.

So get some screenshots, and show what you got!

Edited May 1, 2013 by the brain in a box
